title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.29 - Construction of priorities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7.29 - Construction of priorities

State Regulations

In accordance with the provisions of article XV of the

Waterfront Commission Act, the following priorities of employment are designed
to be consistent with the priorities established in the seniority article of
the collective bargaining agreement between the New York Shipping Association, Inc. and the International Longshoremen's Association. The listing of these
priorities shall not be construed to limit in any way the right of the parties
to the collective bargaining agreement to alter, modify, amend or otherwise
change such priorities or agree upon any other method for the selection of
registered or licensed employees by way of seniority, experience, regular gangs
or otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
